data.title: Studio 7
data.meta_description:
Every Sunday night holds a special surprise for Kapuso viewers as it gives them a chance to hang out with an ever-changing mix of the Network's versatile and best performing artists in 'Studio 7.'

Its first two episode features Asia’s Romantic Balladeer Christian Bautista, Asia’s Pop Sweetheart Julie Anne San Jose and Pop heartthrob Mark Bautista.

Global Endorser Gabbi Garcia and newest Kapuso hunk Rayver Cruz also join the fun in bringing their trending musical performances and grooves on the dance floor.

Kapuso Network’s sought-after stars Kyline Alcantara, Migo Adecer, Mikee Quintos, Kate Valdez and twins Mavy and Cassy Legaspi offer one-of-a-kind performances
